B2 in a way that is very clear, powerful, and detailed in your mind: I vividly remember my first day at school. Research suggested that people can vividly recall events that never happened.
B2 in a way that is very brightly coloured : They are usually dressed in vividly coloured clothing. fishermen in vividly painted boats See
